vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A woman living at the time of the Patriarchs, only mentioned at Job.42.14;
daughter of: Job (H0347);
sister of: Jemimah (H3224) and Keziah (H7103)
§ Keren-happuch = "horn of antimony"
one of the daughters of Job born after his trial
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
基連哈樸 这个陰性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "白金號角"
約伯經試煉所生的第三個女兒 (伯 42:14)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
基连哈朴 这个阴性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "白金号角"
约伯经试炼所生的第三个女儿 (伯 42:14)
